pages.text: Blood Bubble is a projectile spell form. $(br)$(t:Raising these values of the form can increase the profit)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Growth Needs：$(/t)$(t:Increasing the Force of the form can increase the profit)$(li2)$(#00CED1)Force$(/t)$()$(br)$(t:Effect of Spell Attributes on Functional Spells)$(li)$(#6C7B8B)Magical Efficacy：$(/t)$(t:The force of functional spells is unaffected)$(li2)$(#00CED1)Force：1.0$(/t)$()$(t:The range of functional spells is unaffected)$(li2)$(#EE6363)Range：1.0$(/t)$()$(t:The duration of functional spells is unaffected)$(li2)$(#FFB90F)Duration：1.0$(/t)$()$(br2)which will absorb a certain amount of health when touching non-friendly units, and then return to the caster.
